data.name: Dying Night SEX with ZOMBI
data.detailed_description:
• A third-person PORN game set in the future at a research station full of sexy girls.
Explore space stations and read the sexual pleasures of girls from their science computers.
Freely adjust the camera and influence the behavior and appearance of the characters.
Cum on girls, have fun and get ready for the shocking ending of the story ...





  • The intergalactic corporation NOVA is dedicated to providing entertainment for the richest women in the universe.
The corporation, in order to meet the expectations of its clients, started to create secret research centers in space.
In one of them, corporate employees conduct illegal zombie research.
Unfortunately, there has been no contact with this research center for a long time,
but the power consumption shows that the center is still working. The NOVA corporation does not like bad publicity,
so they sent you on a secret mission to find out what happened ...
Your crazy, irresponsible twin sister is one of the employees of this research center.
You go on a journey to solve this mystery, but you feel that your sister is behind everything ...




  • The player moves a sexy naked girl around the research station. During the exploration,
the player reads the sexual experiences of the employees of the research station from computers.
Sexual scenes are viewed from a third person perspective.
The player can freely adjust the camera and influence the behavior and appearance of the characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1070 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
Contains nudity, Genitalia, Pictures with zombie sex scenes
